root.name: noiseSeed()

example.code: xoff = 0.0 noiseSeed(0) stroke(0, 10) for i in range(1000): xoff = xoff + .01 n = noise(xoff) * width line(n, 0, n, height)

root.description: Sets the seed value for noise(). By default, noise() produces different results each time the program is run. Set the seed parameter to a constant to return the same pseudo-random numbers each time the software is run.
